name: Music_496.wav
keywords: ['synth rock/pop', 'acoustic drums', 'drumroll', 'synth lead sound', 'brass/string section', 'fast tempo', 'adventures']
caption: This audio contains an acoustic drum set playing fast snare rolls and then adding in a kick on every beat along with some crash hits. A synthesizer is playing a fast lead melody in the upper register. Then the song breaks into the next part and a brass/string section is playing a melody changing note on every beat together with the kick. This song may be playing for a fast paced video-game.
